messages.subject: Boys and reading
messages.msgSnippet: I just read the post about boys reading and for one I wanted to share that I read that the reason boys read later than girls is the material they are
messages.messageBody:
I just read the post about boys reading and for one I wanted to share that I
read that the reason boys read later than girls is the material they are
'expected' to read doesn't interest them. Here is a site you might check
out...not that I am agreeing with everything he says but I think there are
some valid points not to mention some good ideas of things to suggest:

http://www.guysread.com/

Also, at the end of Kelly's reply to the original "reading' post she wrote,
"What's your hurry?" it struck me differently than any other time in my
life and I think it will become my mantra of sorts. It also goes well with
something Ren posted in reply to my post on control, "Fanny Crosby said
"Live in the moment and make it so beautiful that it will be worth
remembering." Thank you both for the words of wisdom!

In Gratitude,

Christy Putnam
<http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance>
